text: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ

translation.en.sahih: May Allah pardon you, [O Muhammad]; why did you give them permission [to remain behind]? [You should not have] until it was evident to you who were truthful and you knew [who were] the liars.
translation.id.indonesian: Semoga Allah memaafkanmu. Mengapa kamu memberi izin kepada mereka (untuk tidak pergi berperang), sebelum jelas bagimu orang-orang yang benar (dalam keuzurannya) dan sebelum kamu ketahui orang-orang yang berdusta?
